title: Chan-Pak
description: A 100% vegan Thai food restaurant that does not use monosodium glutamate, garlic or onions. All food is made-to-order in-house, including noodle soups, stir fried dishes, soups, specialties and more. Also has a small shop of vegan products. Sidewalk level entrance, spacious, partly outside, no high steps. Come by car. Can call for delivery within reasonable distance.
streetAddress: 7/24 M7 Khlong Song, Khlong Luang, Pathum Thani
